title: [Basilica Platform, Second Level]
description: The irregular shadows of night darkened ruins spread out to the east of the pyramid.  Wide stone steps lead down to the platform below.  Another set of steps lead up to the third level of the pyramid.

From this lofty height it is possible to see the dense forest to the east of the city walls.  Wide stone steps lead down to the streets below.  Another set of steps lead up to the third level of the pyramid.
